verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Avenge <S%H5358><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4084><s%>: afterward <S%H310><s%> shalt thou be gathered <S%H622><s%> unto thy people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Arm <S%H2502><s%> ye men <S%H582><s%> from among you for the war <S%H6635><s%>, that they may go against Midian <S%H4080><s%>, to execute Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s vengeance <S%H5414><s%> on Midian <S%H4080><s%>.
Of every tribe <S%H4294><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>, throughout all the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, shall ye send <S%H7971><s%> to the war <S%H6635><s%>.

So there were delivered <S%H4560><s%>, out of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> of every tribe <S%H4294><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H505><s%>, a thousand of every tribe <S%H4294><s%>, to the war <S%H6635><s%>, them and Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, to the war <S%H6635><s%>, with the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> for the alarm <S%H8643><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And they warred <S%H6633><s%> against Midian <S%H4080><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>; and they slew <S%H2026><s%> every male <S%H2145><s%>.

And they slew <S%H2026><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the rest of their slain <S%H2491><s%>: Evi <S%H189><s%>, and Rekem <S%H7552><s%>, and Zur <S%H6698><s%>, and Hur <S%H2354><s%>, and Reba <S%H7254><s%>, the five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>: Balaam <S%H1109><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> they slew <S%H2026><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took captive <S%H7617><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> and their little ones <S%H2945><s%>; and all their cattle <S%H929><s%>, and all their flocks <S%H4735><s%>, and all their goods <S%H2428><s%>, they took for a prey <S%H962><s%>.
And all their cities <S%H5892><s%> in the places wherein they dwelt <S%H4186><s%>, and all their encampments <S%H2918><s%>, they burnt with fire <S%H784><s%>.
And they took <S%H3947><s%> all the spoil <S%H7998><s%>, and all the prey <S%H4455><s%>, both of man <S%H120><s%> and of beast <S%H929><s%>.

And they brought <S%H935><s%> the captives <S%H7628><s%>, and the prey <S%H4455><s%>, and the spoil <S%H7998><s%>, unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto the camp <S%H4264><s%> at the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, which are by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and all the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, went forth <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> with the officers <S%H6485><s%> of the host <S%H2428><s%>, the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, who came <S%H935><s%> from <S%H6635><s%> the service of the war <S%H4421><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2421><s%>, Have ye saved all the women <S%H5347><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%>?

Behold <S%H2007><s%>, these caused <S%H1961><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, through the counsel <S%H1697><s%> of Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, to commit <S%H4560><s%> trespass <S%H4604><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%>, and so the plague <S%H4046><s%> was among the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Now therefore kill <S%H2026><s%> every male <S%H2145><s%> among the little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and kill <S%H2026><s%> every woman <S%H802><s%> that hath known <S%H3045><s%> man <S%H376><s%> by lying <S%H4904><s%> with him <S%H2145><s%>.
But all the <S%H802><s%> women-children <S%H2945><s%>, that have not known <S%H3045><s%> man <S%H2145><s%> by lying <S%H4904><s%> with him <S%H2421><s%>, keep alive for yourselves.

And encamp <S%H2583><s%> ye without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: whosoever hath killed <S%H2026><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%>, and whosoever hath touched <S%H5060><s%> any slain <S%H2491><s%>, purify <S%H2398><s%> yourselves on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, ye and your captives <S%H7628><s%>.

And as to every garment <S%H899><s%>, and all that is made <S%H3627><s%> of skin <S%H5785><s%>, and all work <S%H4639><s%> of goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair <S%H3627><s%>, and all things made of wood <S%H6086><s%>, ye shall purify yourselves <S%H2398><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H6635><s%> that went <S%H935><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%>, This is the statute <S%H2708><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>:
howbeit the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and the silver <S%H3701><s%>, the brass <S%H5178><s%>, the iron <S%H1270><s%>, the tin <S%H913><s%>, and the lead <S%H5777><s%>,

everything <S%H1697><s%> that may abide <S%H935><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, ye shall make to go through <S%H5674><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, and it shall be clean <S%H2891><s%>; nevertheless it shall be purified <S%H2398><s%> with the water <S%H4325><s%> for impurity <S%H5079><s%>: and all that abideth <S%H935><s%> not the fire <S%H784><s%> ye shall make to go through <S%H5674><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>.

And ye shall wash <S%H3526><s%> your clothes <S%H899><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and ye shall be clean <S%H2891><s%>; and afterward <S%H310><s%> ye shall come <S%H935><s%> into the camp <S%H4264><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the prey <S%H4455><s%> that was taken <S%H7628><s%>, both of man <S%H120><s%> and of beast <S%H929><s%>, thou <S%H499><s%>, and Eleazar the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>;

and divide <S%H2673><s%> the prey <S%H4455><s%> into two parts <S%H2673><s%>: between the men skilled <S%H8610><s%> in war <S%H4421><s%>, that went out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H6635><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.

And levy <S%H7311><s%> a tribute <S%H4371><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> that went out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H6635><s%>: one <S%H259><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, both of the persons <S%H120><s%>, and of the oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and of the asses <S%H2543><s%>, and of the flocks <S%H6629><s%>:
take <S%H3947><s%> it of their half <S%H4276><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> it unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s heave-offering <S%H8641><s%>.

And of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s half <S%H4276><s%>, thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> drawn <S%H270><s%> out of every fifty <S%H2572><s%>, of the persons <S%H120><s%>, of the oxen <S%H1241><s%>, of the asses <S%H2543><s%>, and of the flocks <S%H6629><s%>, even of all the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> them unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, that keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

Now the prey <S%H957><s%>, over and above <S%H3499><s%> the booty <S%H4455><s%> which the men of <S%H5971><s%> war <S%H6635><s%> took <S%H962><s%>, was six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%>,
and threescore and twelve <S%H7657><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%>,
and threescore <S%H8346><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> asses <S%H2543><s%>,

and thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%>, of the women <S%H802><s%> that had not known <S%H3045><s%> man <S%H2145><s%> by lying with him <S%H4904><s%>.

And the half <S%H4275><s%>, which was the portion <S%H2506><s%> of them that went out <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>, was in number <S%H4557><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%>:
and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s tribute <S%H4371><s%> of the sheep <S%H6629><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and threescore and fifteen <S%H7657><s%>.
And the oxen <S%H1241><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>; of which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s tribute <S%H4371><s%> was threescore and twelve <S%H7657><s%>.

And the asses <S%H2543><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>; of which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s tribute <S%H4371><s%> was threescore <S%H8346><s%> and one <S%H259><s%>.

And the persons <S%H120><s%> were sixteen <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>; of whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s tribute <S%H4371><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the tribute <S%H4371><s%>, which was Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s heave-offering <S%H8641><s%>, unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s half <S%H4276><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> divided <S%H2673><s%> off from the men <S%H582><s%> that warred <S%H6633><s%>

(now the congregation <S%H5712><s%>'s half <S%H4275><s%> was three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred3967, 4480 sheep <S%H6629><s%>,
and thirty <S%H7970><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%>,
and thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> asses <S%H2543><s%>,
and sixteen <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%>),

even of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s half <S%H4276><s%>, Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> drawn <S%H270><s%> out of every fifty <S%H2572><s%>, both of man <S%H120><s%> and of beast <S%H929><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, that kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And the officers <S%H6485><s%> that were over the thousands <S%H505><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%>, the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%>, and the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, came near <S%H7126><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>;

and they said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> have taken <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> that are under our charge <S%H3027><s%>, and there lacketh <S%H6485><s%> not one man of us <S%H376><s%>.

And we have brought <S%H7126><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s oblation <S%H7133><s%>, what every man <S%H376><s%> hath gotten <S%H4672><s%>, of jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, ankle-chains <S%H685><s%>, and bracelets <S%H6781><s%>, signet-rings <S%H2885><s%>, ear-rings <S%H5694><s%>, and armlets <S%H3558><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for our souls <S%H5315><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> of them <S%H4639><s%>, even all wrought jewels <S%H3627><s%>.

And all the gold <S%H2091><s%> of the heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> that they offered up <S%H7311><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, of the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%>, and of the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, was sixteen <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>.
<S%H582><s%>( For the men of war <S%H6635><s%> had taken booty <S%H962><s%>, every man for himself <S%H376><s%>.)

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> of the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and of hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> it into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
